item.title: Simulated sensitivity of African terrestrial ecosystem photosynthesis to rainfall frequency, intensity, and rainy season length
item.description:
Guan, R., et al. (2018) “Simulated sensitivity of African terrestrial ecosystem photosynthesis to rainfall frequency, intensity, and rainy season length”, Environmental Research Letters, doi:10.1088/1748-9326/aa9f30.

Abstract:Evidence is growing that there are ongoing changes in the statistics of intra-seasonal rainfall variability over large parts of the world …
item.dc:creator: Kaiyu Guan
